Attributes.description: Review of principles. Particle mechanics: Euler's equations, tops and gyroscopes, motion of the Earth, Lagrangian and Hamiltonian methods. Variational principles in optics and mechanics, Liouville's theorem and statistical mechanics. The relationship between classical and quantum mechanics.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 9:00, End Time: 10:00, Building: Hennings, Room: 201
